title: How do I install a SIM/UIM card?
answer: ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109269) Figure 1-1Installing a SIM/UIM card to the CHC-U03 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109270) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109271) Before you insert a micro-SIM card, power off the phone. [[When you are inserting a micro-SIM card, make sure the gold contact and beveled edge are facing the correct directions.]()]()
